detail_desc: Fully lined sports bralette in fast-drying functional fabric. The bralette is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility. Light support.
Long-sleeved top in sweatshirt fabric with a print motif. Lined hood, kangaroo pocket, and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Short coat in felted fabric with draped lapels and a wrapover front with a concealed press-stud fastening. Tie belt at the waist, side pockets and a single back vent. Lined.
T-shirt in organic cotton jersey with a round neck, dropped shoulders, flounce-trimmed sleeves and a straight-cut hem.
Bikini. Top with a lined front and narrow, flounce-trimmed shoulder straps. Bottoms with a lined gusset. The bikini lining is made of recycled polyester.
Fitted top in viscose jersey with decorative buttons at the front, a low neckline and short sleeves.
Trousers in study jersey with tapered legs, zip fly with a press-stud, sewn-in creases and elastic foot straps at the hems.

Set with a jacket and pair of trousers in soft fleece designed to be worn as a thermal mid layer. Jacket with a stand-up collar, zip down the front with a chin guard, long raglan sleeves and jersey trims at the cuffs and hem. Trousers with an elasticated waist and jersey trims at the hems. The polyester content of the set is partly recycled.

Shirt in checked cotton twill with a button-down collar, classic front and yoke with a pleat at the back. Open chest pocket, long sleeves, adjustable buttoning at the cuffs and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back. Regular Fit – a classic fit with good room for movement over the shoulders and chest, which combined with a gently tapered waist creates a comfortable, tailored silhouette.
Slim-fit jeans in washed, stretch denim with fake front pockets, real back pockets and flared hems. Wide panel at the waist for best fit over the tummy.
V-neck blouse in airy, patterned viscose with lacing at the top and long, wide sleeves with a frill trim at the cuffs.
Shorts in sweatshirt fabric with wide elastication at the waist and side pockets.
Relaxed-fit polo-neck jumper in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Short, off-the-shoulder blouse in a viscose crêpe weave with lace details. Narrow adjustable shoulder straps and long, wide sleeves with lace trims.
Tunic in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, side pockets and a belt. Long sleeves with a tab and button, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Sports vest top in soft, fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and a shorter top in airy fabric layered over the top.
Cropped top in ribbed jersey with a turtle neck and long sleeves.
Trainer sandals in cotton canvas with a hook and loop tab at the front and small loop at the back. Cotton canvas linings and insoles and patterned soles.

Short, straight-cut coat in a recycled Italian wool blend with a small stand-up collar and concealed press-studs down the front. Detachable belt that defines the waist and discreet side pockets. Lined. The wool and polyester content of the coat is recycled.
Ankle-length trousers in a softly draping viscose weave containing some linen. High waist with elastication at the back, pleats at the front, diagonal side pockets and wide, straight legs.
Jumper in a soft, rib knit with a small stand-up collar and long sleeves.
Sunglasses with metal frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
Joggers in sweatshirt fabric made from a cotton blend. Relaxed fit with covered elastication and a drawstring at the waist and ribbed hems.
Lace T-shirt bra with underwired, padded cups that shape the bust and provide good support. Adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back.
Satin blouse with a small stand-up collar, V-neck and pleat at the front. Long sleeves with two covered buttons at the cuffs, and a rounded hem. Slightly longer at the back.
Kaftan in an airy, patterned weave with a V-neck front and back and open sides held together by a button.
Cardigan in a soft knit with dropped shoulders, long sleeves, front pockets and no buttons.
Jacket in light sweatshirt fabric with a lined hood, zip down the front, side pockets and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with a drawstring hood, zip down the front, long raglan sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem.
Top in slub jersey made from a modal and cotton blend with a lace-trimmed, wrapover V-neck and a seam under the bust with a braided tie belt with tassels at the ends.
Ankle-length trousers in a viscose weave. Covered elastication at the waist with a small frill trim and a decorative bow with tassels. Side pockets and straight, wide legs.
Short nightdress in soft jersey with a lace-trimmed V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Top in a soft, fine-knit viscose blend with a round neck and dolman sleeves.
Long-sleeved top in soft viscose jersey with a round neck and gathered side seams for optimum comfort over the tummy.
Short, fitted jersey top with narrow shoulder straps.

Set with a top and leggings in soft cotton. Top in lightweight, printed sweatshirt fabric with long raglan sleeves, press-studs at the back of one shoulder and short slits in the sides.Leggings in jersey with an elasticated waist.
Wide, V-neck blouse in a viscose weave with a pompom trim at the top and on the sleeves. Gathered yoke at the back and long balloon sleeves with elastication at the cuffs.
Leggings in soft cotton jersey with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut dress in soft, patterned cotton jersey with a round, ribbed neckline, a flounced trim over the shoulders and long sleeves.
Short shorts in woven fabric with a high paper bag waist with wide elastication, a fake fly and pockets in the side seams with metal details.
Bandeau bikini top in smocked fabric with ties at the back of the neck and no fasteners.
Baby Exclusive. Fully lined cardigan in a textured knit made from soft organic cotton. Hood with ear appliqués and a zip down the front.
Long-sleeved jumper in a soft, fine knit with a wide neckline and seam under the bust.
Round shopper in braided paper straw with imitation leather details. Two handles at the top and one zipped inner compartment. Lined. Depth 9 cm. Diameter 38 cm.

Lightweight jacket in a patterned, cotton crêpe weave with notch lapels, gently dropped shoulders and long sleeves with a tab and button. Jetted front pockets, slits in the sides and no fasteners. Unlined.
Wide blouse in woven fabric with elastication and decorative gathers around the neckline and a small frilled collar. Long raglan sleeves with wide smocking and a small frill trim at the cuffs.
Long-sleeved top in soft sweatshirt fabric with ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.

Sports vest top in ribbed fast-drying functional fabric with a racer back and decorative seams at the sides. The top is designed with the minimum number of seams for a more comfortable fit and increased mobility.
Sleeveless lace top with a round neckline, concealed zip at the back and a scalloped hem. Jersey lining.
Short skirt with a high waist and a detachable, adjustable belt at the waist. Unlined.
5-pocket slim-fit jeans in supersoft, stretch denim with an adjustable, elasticated waist, zip fly and legs with seams and narrow hems.
Double-layered hat in a soft, fine knit. Turn-up at the hem with a small appliqué on the front.

Body in mesh and lace with a push-up bra. Underwired, padded cups for a larger bust and fuller cleavage, adjustable shoulder straps and a hook-and-eye fastening at the back. Lined gusset with concealed press-studs and cutaway coverage at the back.
Short, fitted dress in stretch denim with a collar, zip down the front and long sleeves. Unlined.
Blouse in a softly draping Tencel™ lyocell weave with a wide, round neckline, short elasticated sleeves, shimmering buttons down the front and a flared peplum.
Sleeveless dress in patterned cotton jersey with a smocked seam at the waist.
Cardigan in lightweight organic cotton sweatshirt fabric. Zip down the front with a chin guard, side pockets and ribbing around the neckline, cuffs and hem.
Short skirt in a textured weave with a wrapover front with a decorative metal ring and tie at the side, and a concealed zip at the back. Lined.

Jacket in woven fabric with a zip-detail stand-up collar and shoulder tabs with a press-stud. Zip with a wind flap and press-studs down the front, chest pockets and flap front pockets with a press-stud. Drawstring at the waist and a press-stud at the cuffs. Unlined.
Fine-knit tights in a soft cotton blend with an elasticated waist.
Straight-cut top in cotton jersey with short, voluminous puff sleeves in a crisp cotton weave with concealed elastication.
Mittens in a soft knit with ribbing at the cuffs. Sizes 0-6M without thumbs.
Pull-on shorts in washed cotton denim with an elasticated waist, diagonal side pockets and a back pocket.
Bodysuit in soft, organic cotton jersey with a concealed press-stud on one shoulder, long sleeves and press-studs at the crotch.
Hair elastics with a decorative bow and no metal clips.
Trousers in soft viscose jersey with an all-over print and regular, elasticated waist. Side pockets, low crotch and tapered legs.
Short, 5-pocket shorts in washed denim with an embroidered pattern. Regular waist, button fly and sewn-in, raw-edge turn-ups at the hems.
Long-sleeved shirt in woven fabric with a collar, buttons down the front, yoke at the back and rounded hem.
Double-layered hat in a soft rib knit with a sewn-in turn-up at the hem with a small fabric appliqué on the front.
Short-sleeved top in organic cotton jersey with a deep V-neck with a gathered seam.
T-shirt in soft jersey with raw edges.
Metal rings in various designs that come in a gift box with a transparent lid and a satin ribbon at the top.
Fine-knit socks in a soft cotton blend with anti-slip protectors.
Shorter top in sweatshirt fabric with a stand-up collar, zip at the top, long sleeves and ribbing at the cuffs and hem. Soft brushed inside.
Top in an airy, crinkled weave with a gentle V-neck and narrow, adjustable shoulder straps.
Long-sleeved blouse in an airy jacquard weave with a frill at the front and along the sleeves, concealed zip at the back and a seam with a wide frill at the hem.
Knee-length one-shoulder dress in woven fabric with a narrow, adjustable shoulder strap and double flounce at the top and an elasticated seam at the waist. Rounded and longer at the back. Unlined.
Slim sunglasses with plastic frames and UV-protective, tinted lenses.
T-shirt in soft, printed cotton jersey.
